suggestions: Term. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, this Agreement shall terminate and be of no further force and effect one (1) year from the date hereof, provided that in no case shall the Receiving Party be relieved from its responsibilities with respect to any breach of this Agreement prior to such termination. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the confidentiality obligations set forth in this Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of three (3) years following the date of disclosure of any Confidential Information, or for a period of three (3) years following the termination of this Agreement, whichever is later.
originalTexts: Term. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, this Agreement shall terminate and be of no further force and effect one (1) year from the date hereof, provided that in no case shall the Receiving Party be relieved from its responsibilities with respect to any breach of this Agreement prior to such termination.
